metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3517 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
A vulnerability was found in the minimatch package. This flaw allows aRegular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) when calling the braceExpandfunction with specific arguments, resulting in a Denial of Service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3517` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-minimatch - 3.1.1+~3.0.5-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: node-minimatch package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.1+~3.0.5-1').
